TextLibrary.Text: I knew you would return here, but you are too late!
I knew you would return here, but you are too late!
I knew you would return here, but you are too late!
I knew you would return here, but you are too late!
Bane! What have you done to the Iceguard Warriors you took?
Bane! What have you done to the Iceguard Warriors you took?
Bane! What have you done to the Iceguard Warriors you took?
Bane! What have you done to the Iceguard Warriors you took?
Allow me to introduce you to the Baneguard - perhaps you will see a few familiar faces amongst them.
Allow me to introduce you to the Baneguard - perhaps you will see a few familiar faces amongst them.
Allow me to introduce you to the Baneguard - perhaps you will see a few familiar faces amongst them.
Allow me to introduce you to the Baneguard - perhaps you will see a few familiar faces amongst them.
You've turned the Iceguard into Undead? You'll pay for this, Bane!
You've turned the Iceguard into Undead? You'll pay for this, Bane!

You've turned the Iceguard into Undead? You'll pay for this, Bane!
